name: Spaghetti Carbonara
info: A classic Italian pasta dish made with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and pepper.

name: Margherita Pizza
info: A simple pizza topped with tomato, fresh mozzarella, basil, and olive oil.

name: Caesar Salad
info: A crisp salad with romaine lettuce, Caesar dressing, croutons, and parmesan cheese.

name: Beef Burger
info: A juicy beef patty served with lettuce, tomato, cheese, and a soft bun.

name: Vegetarian Burger
info: A delicious plant-based patty with fresh vegetables, cheese, and sauce.

name: Chicken Tikka Masala
info: Tender chicken in a creamy tomato-based curry sauce with aromatic spices.

name: Fish and Chips
info: Crispy battered fish fillets served with thick-cut fries and tartar sauce.

name: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
info: Melted cheese between two slices of toasted bread, served with a side of pickles.

name: Peking Duck
info: Crispy duck served with pancakes, hoisin sauce, and cucumber.

name: Sushi Roll
info: Fresh sushi rolls with fish, rice, and seaweed.

name: Fettuccine Alfredo
info: Creamy pasta with parmesan cheese and a rich white sauce.

name: Eggplant Parmesan
info: Breaded and fried eggplant slices topped with marinara sauce and melted mozzarella.

name: Tacos
info: Soft tortillas filled with seasoned beef, lettuce, cheese, and salsa.

name: Pad Thai
info: A popular Thai stir-fried noodle dish with tamarind, peanuts, and lime.

name: Ramen
info: Japanese noodle soup with a rich broth, meat, and fresh vegetables.

name: Chicken Wings
info: Crispy wings tossed in a spicy buffalo sauce, served with ranch dressing.

name: Lamb Shawarma
info: Spiced lamb served with fresh veggies, tahini, and pita bread.

name: Falafel
info: Fried chickpea balls served with hummus, salad, and pita bread.

name: Moussaka
info: A Greek casserole made of layers of eggplant, ground meat, and b√©chamel sauce.

name: Crepes
info: Thin French pancakes filled with Nutella, fruits, or whipped cream.
